name: Miasma (MezzanineGames) (MezzanineGames)
description: The year is 1349. The city of Krówka lies on the brink of ruin as an unknown and deadly plague grips the people. Thousands die in their homes and even more roam the streets as violent and bloodthirsty beasts in search of their next victim. Enter The Doctor. After several years away studying medicine in Jerusalem, The Doctor arrives in Krówka in an attempt to help develop a cure. Equipped with bravery, your trusty cane and with the help of Gregori, your devoted and equally brilliant assistant, perhaps the two of you can stay the complete destruction of the city and cure the Miasma that weighs like a curse upon the land.
